thread.title: Solid mid-range hotel in convenient location
thread.title_full: Solid mid-range hotel in convenient location - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: alwyn1
title: Solid mid-range hotel in convenient location
text:
Just a 2 minute walk from Gloucester Road underground station in a convenient location in central London. As you approach the hotel, the front of the building does not give a good first impression which is a pity because once inside, although looking a little dated, the place is spotlessly clean with attentive professional staff.
Our room was on the top floor of five and overlooking the street. It was a reasonable size with a comfortable bed and good wardrobe and drawer space. Although the front of the hotel is on quite a busy street, the room was quiet and we had a good night's sleep.
The bathroom was modern and had a shower over the bath. There were good quality bathrobes and slippers. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in the rooms.
The continental breakfast is good with a hot option at a modest extra charge if you require it.
If you are on a budget but still want a comfortable decent quality mid range hotel in a central London location, this is a good choice.
